body: 370398 is sequel. Did not turn into NTR. The GF is just a masochist and wants the guy to learn his BDSM skills else where LMAO
Damn this character is so fucking dislikeable

The last page I think the sexual partner(SP) likes BF and tells him something like "if your GF doesn't want to do it with you, I'll do it with you instead <3 "; then later on he receives an invitation from her, which is a hint to the next part for more sexual adventures! :D :D :D
